name: action-github-workflow-sync
description: Github Action To Sync Github Action's Workflow Files Across Repositories

scripts.prepare-git: ncc build src/index.js -o dist --source-map --license licenses.txt && git add -f ./dist/** && git commit -m "Updated" && git push

author: moauto <54212639+mo-auto@users.noreply.github.com> (https://github.com/mo-auto)
